verbs.description: ST . PETERSBURG , Russia ( AP ) - " Toxic " political infighting [V: is] preventing U.S. President Donald Trump from improving relations with Moscow , Russia 's former ambassador in the United States and a long - time Trump campaign contact told The Associated Press on Friday .
